movie.title: Escape from the Planet of the Apes
movie.title_english: Escape from the Planet of the Apes
movie.title_long: Escape from the Planet of the Apes (1971)
movie.description_intro: Following the events in "Beneath the Planet of the Apes", Cornelius and Zira flee back through time to 20th Century Los Angeles, where they face fear and persecution similar to what Taylor and Brent suffered in the future, and discover the origins of the stream of events that will shape their world.
movie.description_full: Following the events in "Beneath the Planet of the Apes", Cornelius and Zira flee back through time to 20th Century Los Angeles, where they face fear and persecution similar to what Taylor and Brent suffered in the future, and discover the origins of the stream of events that will shape their world.

movies.title: Arsenal
movies.summary: A powerful action thriller, ARSENAL tells the intertwining stories of the Lindel brothers, Mikey (Johnathon Schaech) and JP (Adrian Grenier), who had only each other to rely on growing up. As adults, JP found success as the owner of a construction company, while Mikey became a small-time mobster, mired in a life of petty crime. When Mikey is kidnapped and held for a ransom by ruthless crime boss Eddie King (Nicolas Cage), JP turns to the brothers' old pal Sal (John Cusack), a plain clothes detective for help. In order to rescue his brother, JP must risk everything and unleash his vengeance against King's relentless army of gangsters.

In order to rescue his brother, JP must risk everything and unleash his vengeance against King's relentless army of gangsters.

movies.title: Detective Chinatown 2
movies.summary: Tang and Qin team up to solve a murder in New York's Chinatown.
movies.description_full: Tang and Qin team up to solve a murder in New York's Chinatown.
movies.synopsis: Tang and Qin team up to solve a murder in New York's Chinatown.

movies.title: Double Dragon
movies.summary: Set 15 years in the future in post-earthquake California, where San Diego and Los Angeles are merged into one city, two teenage brothers have half of a powerful ancient Chinese talisman. Millionaire Koga Shuko (a.k.a. Guisman) has the other half and determines to get the brothers' half in order to have the complete medallion and the absolute power of the magical Double Dragon talisman.

movies.title: Samurai III: Duel at Ganryu Island
movies.title_english: Samurai III: Duel at Ganryu Island
movies.title_long: Samurai III: Duel at Ganryu Island (1956)
movies.summary: A humble and simple Takezo abandons his life as a knight errant. He's sought as a teacher and vassal by Shogun, Japan's most powerful clan leader. He's also challenged to fight by the supremely confident and skillful Sasaki Kojiro. Takezo agrees to fight Kojiro in a year's time but rejects Shogun's patronage, choosing instead to live on the edge of a village, raising vegetables. He's followed there by Otsu and later by Akemi, both in love with him. The year ends as Takezo assists the villagers against a band of brigands. He seeks Otsu's forgiveness and accepts her love, then sets off across the water to Ganryu Island for his final contest.
